name: Bulbasaur
Description: Bulbasaur has a 'bulb' on its back that grows steadily larger as it matures. This bulb contains a seed which uses photosynthesis to supply Bulbasaur with energy. It is known as the Seed Pokemon.

name: Ivysaur
Description: Ivysaur is a quadrupedal amphibian Pokemon that has blue-green skin with darker patches. On top of its head are pointed ears with black insides and it has narrow red eyes.

name: Venusaur
Description: Venusaur is a dual-type Grass / Poison Pokemon introduced in Generation I. It evolves from Ivysaur starting at level 32. It is the final form of Bulbasaur.

name: Charmander
Description: Obviously prefers hot places. When it rains, steam is said to spout from the tip of its tail.

name: Charmeleon
Description: When it swings its burning tail, it elevates the temperature to unbearably high levels.

name: Charizard
Description: Spits fire that is hot enough to melt boulders. Known to cause forest fires unintentionally.

name: Squirtle
Description: After birth, its back swells and hardens into a shell. Powerfully sprays foam from its mouth.

name: Wartortle
Description: Often hides in water to stalk unwary prey. For swimming fast, it moves its ears to maintain balance.

name: Blastoise
Description: A brutal Pokemon with pressurized water jets on its shell. They are used for high speed tackles.

name: Caterpie
Description: Its short feet are tipped with suction pads that enable it to tirelessly climb slopes and walls.

name: Metapod
Description: This Pokemon is vulnerable to attack while its shell is soft, exposing its weak and tender body.

name: Butterfree
Description: In battle, it flaps its wings at high speed to release highly toxic dust into the air.

name: Weedle
Description: Often found in forests and grasslands. It has a sharp stinger on its head that injects poison.

name: Kakuna
Description: Kakuna is a yellow cocoon Pokemon

name: Beedrill
Description: Beedrill is a Bug/Poison type Pokemon introduced in Generation 1. It is known as the Poison Bee Pokemon.

name: Pidgey
Description: Pidgey is a Normal/Flying type Pokemon introduced in Generation 1. It is known as the Tiny Bird Pokemon.

name: Pidgeotto
Description: Pidgeotto is a Normal/Flying type Pokemon introduced in Generation 1. It is known as the Bird Pokemon.

name: Pidgeot
Description: Pidgeot is a Normal/Flying type Pokemon introduced in Generation 1. It is known as the Bird Pokemon.

name: Rattata
Description: Rattata is a Normal type Pokemon introduced in Generation 1. It is known as the Mouse Pokemon.

name: Raticate
Description: Raticate is a Normal type Pokemon introduced in Generation 1. It is known as the Mouse Pokemon.

name: Spearow
Description: Spearow is a Normal/Flying type Pokemon introduced in Generation 1. It is known as the Tiny Bird Pokemon.

name: Fearow
Description: Fearow is a Normal/Flying type Pokemon introduced in Generation 1. It is known as the Beak Pokemon.

name: Ekans
Description: Ekans is a Poison type Pokemon introduced in Generation 1. It is known as the Snake Pokemon.

name: Arbok
Description: Arbok is a Poison type Pokemon introduced in Generation 1. It is known as the Cobra Pokemon.

name: Pikachu
Description: Pikachu is an Electric type Pokemon introduced in Generation 1. It is known as the Mouse Pokemon.

name: Raichu
Description: Raichu is an Electric type Pokemon introduced in Generation 1. It is known as the Mouse Pokemon.

name: Sandshrew
Description: Sandshrew is a Ground type Pokemon introduced in Generation 1. It is known as the Mouse Pokemon.

name: Sandslash
Description: Sandslash is a Ground type Pokemon introduced in Generation 1. It is known as the Mouse Pokemon.

name: Nidoran♀
Description: Nidoran♀ is a Poison type Pokemon introduced in Generation 1. It is known as the Poison Pin Pokemon.

name: Nidorina
Description: Nidorina is a Poison type Pokemon introduced in Generation 1. It is known as the Poison Pin Pokemon.

name: Nidoqueen
Description: Nidoqueen is a Poison/Ground type Pokemon introduced in Generation 1. It is known as the Drill Pokemon.

name: Nidoran♂
Description: Nidoran♂ is a Poison type Pokemon introduced in Generation 1. It is known as the Poison Pin Pokemon.

name: Nidorino
Description: Nidorino is a Poison type Pokemon introduced in Generation 1. It is known as the Poison Pin Pokemon.

name: Nidoking
Description: Nidoking is a Poison/Ground type Pokemon introduced in Generation 1. It is known as the Drill Pokemon.

name: Clefairy
Description: Clefairy is a Fairy type Pokemon introduced in Generation 1. It is known as the Fairy Pokemon.

name: Clefable
Description: Clefable is a Fairy type Pokemon introduced in Generation 1. It is known as the Fairy Pokemon.

name: Vulpix
Description: Vulpix is a Fire type Pokemon introduced in Generation 1. It is known as the Fox Pokemon.

name: Ninetales
Description: Ninetales is a Fire type Pokemon introduced in Generation 1. It is known as the Fox Pokemon.

name: Jigglypuff
Description: Jigglypuff is a Normal/Fairy type Pokemon introduced in Generation 1. It is known as the Balloon Pokemon.

name: Wigglytuff
Description: Wigglytuff is a Normal/Fairy type Pokemon introduced in Generation 1. It is known as the Balloon Pokemon.

name: Zubat
Description: Zubat is a Poison/Flying type Pokemon introduced in Generation 1. It is known as the Bat Pokemon.

name: Golbat
Description: Golbat is a Poison/Flying type Pokemon introduced in Generation 1. It is known as the Bat Pokemon.

name: Oddish
Description: Oddish is a Grass/Poison type Pokemon introduced in Generation 1. It is known as the Weed Pokemon.

name: Gloom
Description: Gloom is a Grass/Poison type Pokemon introduced in Generation 1. It is known as the Weed Pokemon.

name: Vileplume
Description: Vileplume is a Grass/Poison type Pokemon introduced in Generation 1. It is known as the Flower Pokemon.

name: Paras
Description: Paras is a Bug/Grass type Pokemon introduced in Generation 1. It is known as the Mushroom Pokemon.

name: Parasect
Description: Parasect is a Bug/Grass type Pokemon introduced in Generation 1. It is known as the Mushroom Pokemon.

name: Venonat
Description: Venonat is a Bug/Poison type Pokemon introduced in Generation 1. It is known as the Insect Pokemon.

name: Venomoth
Description: Venomoth is a Bug/Poison type Pokemon introduced in Generation 1. It is known as the Poison Moth Pokemon.

name: Diglet
Description: Diglett, the Mole Pokemon. Diglett love to create underground tunnel systems.

name: Dugtrio
Description: Dugtrio, the evolved form of Diglett. No specific information available.

name: Meowth
Description: Meowth, the Scratch Cat Pokemon. When it sees round objects, it plays and loses track of time.

name: Persian
Description: Persian, the Classy Cat Pokemon and the evolved form of Meowth. Persian can walk silently thanks to its nimble muscles. It pounces on its prey at lightning speed.

name: Psyduck
Description: Psyduck, a Water Pokemon. Uses mysterious power to perform various attacks. Psyduck constantly suffers from a headache.

name: Golduck
Description: Golduck, the Duck Pokemon. It makes its home in lakes, and is able to swim faster than a gold medalist.

name: Mankey
Description: Mankey, a Pig Monkey Pokemon of the Fighting type. Known for its superior footwork, it packs a powerful punch.

name: Primeape
Description: Primeape. If you make eye contact with this evolved form of Mankey, it will chase you forever.

name: Growlithe
Description: Growlithe, a Puppy Pokemon of pleasant demeanor and great diligence. It drives enemies away with barks and bites.

name: Arcanine
Description: Arcanine, the Legendary Pokemon. Arcanine runs so smoothly it appears to be flying, and is known for its majestic cry.

name: Poliwag
Description: Poliwag, the Tadpole Pokemon. It has no arms, but its tail makes it a strong swimmer.

name: Poliwhirl
Description: Poliwhirl, the Tadpole Pokemon. Its highly developed muscles allow Poliwhirl to move efficiently on land, but it is even more agile in water.

name: Poliwrath
Description: Poliwhirl, the Tadpole Pokemon. Its highly developed muscles allow Poliwhirl to move efficiently on land, but it is even more agile in water.

name: Abra
Description: Abra, the Psi Pokemon. When Abra senses an imminent attack, it escapes by teleporting.

name: Kadabra
Description: Kadabra, a Psychic Pokemon. The evolved form of Abra. Employs powerful telekinetic attacks.

name: Alakazam
Description: Alakazam, a Psi Pokemon. This Pokemon uses Psychic attacks to overcome its opponents.

name: Machop
Description: Machop. Its body is pure muscle. Its special attack is the Seismic Toss.

name: Machoke
Description: Machoke, the Superpower Pokemon. With enough strength to lift a giant truck with one hand, Machoke are often used for extremely heavy work.

name: Machamp
Description: Machamp, the Superpower Pokemon. A Fighting type. Machamp's four arms move reflexively, which makes it very fast and allows it to deliver rapid-fire punches.

name: Bellsprout
Description: Bellsprout, the Flower Pokemon. A Grass and Poison type. Bellsprout loves high temperatures and humidity. It can be lightning fast when it extends its vines in order to grab something.

name: Weepinbell
Description: Weepinbell, the Flycatcher Pokemon. Weepinbell looks like a plant and covers opponents with a poisonous powder in order to catch them.

name: Victreebel
Description: Said to live in huge colonies deep in jungles, although no one has ever returned from there.

name: Tentacool
Description: Tentacool, a Jellyfish Pokemon. 99% of its body is made up of water.

name: Tentacruel
Description: Tentacruel, the Jellyfish Pokemon. Its potent poison stingers can quickly paralyze its victims.

name: Geodude
Description: Geodude, the Rock Pokemon. Geodude has incredibly high defensive power, making it virtually resistant to any physical attacks.

name: Graveler
Description: Graveler, Alola Form. The Rock Pokemon. A Rock and Electric type. The evolved form of Geodude. Graveler like to eat rocks and are known to get into fights.

name: Golem
Description: Golem, a Megaton Pokemon. Once a year it sheds its bedrock shell and grows larger.

name: Ponyta
Description: Ponyta, a Fire Horse Pokemon. Its mane is made of intense flames.

name: Rapidash
Description: Rapidash, the Fire Horse Pokemon. A Fire type. Rapidash loves to gallop. Whenever it sees something moving fast, it gets the urge to race.

name: Slowpoke
Description: Slowpoke, the Dopey Pokemon. Slowpoke is always lost in thought, though no one knows what it's pondering.

name: Slowbro
Description: Slowpoke, the Dopey Pokemon. Slowpoke is always lost in thought, though no one knows what it's pondering.

name: Magnemite
Description: Magnemite, a Magnet Pokemon. Its means of floating through the air are not understood. This very mysterious Pokemon is of the Electric type.

name: Magneton
Description: Magneton, the Magnet Pokemon. The evolved form of Magnemite. Its anti-gravitational powers allow it to float, and it can emit powerful magnetic and electric fields.

name: Farfetchd
Description: Farfetch'd, a Wild Duck Pokemon. Farfetch'd makes a delicious meal, especially when cooked with leek. Because of this, Farfetch'd is nearly extinct.

name: Doduo
Description: Doduo, the Twin Bird Pokemon. It runs faster than it can fly.

name: Dodrio
Description: Dodrio, a Triple Bird Pokemon. Its three heads represent joy, sorrow, and anger.

name: Seel
Description: Seel hunts for prey in the frigid sea underneath sheets of ice. When it needs to breathe, it punches a hole through the ice with the sharply protruding section of its head.

name: Dewgong
Description: Dewgong, the Sea Lion Pokemon. The evolved form of Seel. This Water/Ice Pokemon can easily resist extreme cold.

name: Grimer
Description: Grimer, a Sludge Pokemon. Born from sludge, these Pokemon specialize in Sludge attacks.

name: Muk
Description: Muk, Grimer's evolved form. Use extreme caution, as its slimy form contains poison.

name: Shellder
Description: At night, this Pokemon uses its broad tongue to burrow a hole in the seafloor sand and then sleep in it. While it is sleeping, Shellder closes its shell, but leaves its tongue hanging out.

name: Cloyster
Description: At night, this Pokemon uses its broad tongue to burrow a hole in the seafloor sand and then sleep in it. While it is sleeping, Shellder closes its shell, but leaves its tongue hanging out.

name: Gastly
Description: Gastly, a Ghost Pokemon. It is usually invisible. Its specialty is Hypnosis.

name: Haunter
Description: Haunter, the Gas Pokemon. After evolving from Gastly, this Haunter can learn the Dream Eater and Psychic attacks.

name: Genger
Description: Gengar, a Shadow Pokemon. The evolved form of Haunter. Details about this Pokemon are unknown.

name: Onix
Description: Onix, the Rock Snake Pokemon. It tunnels through the ground, which shakes when it raises its thunderous roar. It can move the ground at 50 miles per hour.

name: Drowzee
Description: Drowzee, the Hypnotic Pokemon. It is said to feed on the dreams of its opponents. It is also known for its powerful Psychic attack.

name: Hypno
Description: Hypno, a Hypnosis Pokemon. It carries a pendulum-like device and performs hypnotic attacks.

name: Krabby
Description: Krabby. Lives near the shore. Its average height is about 16 inches.

name: Kingler
Description: Kingler, the Pincer Pokemon. The evolved form of Krabby. Its crushing claws make it a powerful opponent.

name: Voltorb
Description: Voltorb. The identity of this creature is unknown. It has an extreme personality, uses Electric attacks, and at times self-destructs.

name: Electrode
Description: lectrode, the evolved form of Voltorb. Highly concentrated electric energy causes this Pokemon to explode unpredictably.

name: Exeggcute
Description: Exeggcute, an Egg Pokemon. Although it resembles an egg, it is known to be more closely related to the seed of a plant.

name: Exeggutor
Description: Exeggutor, a Coconut Pokemon. Also known as The Walking Tropical Rainforest. Each coconut has a distinct face and its own character. Its special attack is Hypnosis.

name: Cubone
Description: A Ground-type Pokemon, Cubone has earned its classification as the Lonely Pokemon from its usual attitude of caring only for itself.

name: Marowak
Description: Marowak, a Bone Keeper Pokemon. Despite its small size, its offensive and defensive strength is impressive.

name: Hitmonlee
Description: Hitmonlee, the Kicking Pokemon. This nimble Pokemon launches lethal kicks from almost any position.

name: Hitmonchan
Description: Hitmonchan, a skilled Fighting Pokemon that packs an incredibly fast punch.

name: Kickitung
Description: Lickitung, the Licking Pokemon. It uses a tongue that is more than twice the length of its body to battle, as well as to gather food.

name: Koffing
Description: Koffing, the Poison Gas Pokemon. Koffing hovers in the air, thanks to the poisonous gases it contains, which have a foul odor and can explode.

name: Weezing
Description: Where two kinds of poison gases meet, 2 Koffings can fuse into a Weezing over many years.

name: Rhyhorn
Description: Rhyhorn, the Spiked Pokemon. Rhyhorn is known for its physical power and its considerable offensive and defensive battle skills.

name: Rhydon
Description: Rhydon, the evolved form of Rhyhorn. It is known as the Drill Pokemon. Its large horn gives it formidable attack power.

name: Chansey
Description: Chansey, the Egg Pokemon, and the evolved form of Happiny. Chansey is a kind Pokemon who shares its egg with those who are sick or injured.

name: Tangela
Description: Tangela, a Vine Pokemon. Its body is wrapped in vines. The rest of its form is hidden beneath these vines.

name: Kangaskhan
Description: Kangaskhan, the Parent Pokemon. A Normal type. Kangaskhan carries a little one in the pouch on its belly and will protect it at all costs.

name: Horsea
Description: Horsea, a Dragon Pokemon. In this unique Pokemon species, thousands of Eggs hatch every spring, and then the male raises them himself.

name: Seadra
Description: Seadra, the Dragon Pokemon. It is known for its horrible disposition, but possesses both strength and speed.

name: Goldeen
Description: Goldeen, the Goldfish Pokemon. A Water type. When the weather warms up, Goldeen form schools and swim upriver. Some say this is a sign that spring has arrived.

name: Seaking
Description: Seaking, the Goldfish Pokemon. Seaking is the evolved form of Goldeen. Its sharp, drill-like horn is capable of crushing even stone.

name: Staryu
Description: Staryu. The core of this Water Pokemon shines in a rainbow of seven colors, a core that is valued by some as a type of jewelry.

name: Starmie
Description: Starmie's center section - the core - glows brightly in seven colors. Because of its luminous nature, this Pokemon has been given the nickname as -the gem of the sea-.

name: Mr.Mime
Description: Mr. Mime, the Barrier Pokemon. By rapidly moving its fingers, Mr. Mime can stop air molecules to create an invisible wall.

name: Scyther
Description: Scyther and Electabuzz are both rare Pokemon. They are able to distinguish colors and become enraged by the color red.

name: Jynx
Description: Jynx, the Human Shape Pokemon. This Pokemon has some very unusual powers. Its special attack is the Lovely Kiss, which puts its opponent into a deep sleep.

name: Electabuzz
Description: Scyther and Electabuzz are both rare Pokemon. They are able to distinguish colors and become enraged by the color red.

name: Magmar
Description: Magmar, the Spitfire Pokemon. Its body is like a furnace, making Magmar a living inferno. It has been discovered only near active volcanoes.

name: Pinsir
Description: Pinsir. This fearsome Pokemon uses its powerful claws to put the squeeze on its opponents.

name: Tauros
Description: Tauros, a Wild Bull Pokemon. When whipping itself with its three tails, its Tackle is a powerful destructive force.

name: Magikarp
Description: Magikarp, the Fish Pokemon. Magikarp can live in the dirtiest of water. It jumps very well and can evolve into Gyarados.

name: Gyarados
Description: Gyarados. This Pokemon has a vicious temperament, so use extreme caution. Its fangs can crush stones and its scales are harder than steel.

name: Lapras
Description: Lapras, the Transport Pokemon. Lapras enjoys carrying people on its back, and it understands what people are saying.

name: Ditto
Description: Ditto, a Transform Pokemon. It is able to rearrange the cells of its body and assume any form. Its only attack is Transform.

name: Eevee
Description: Eevee, the Evolution Pokemon. It has the potential to evolve into any one of three different Pokemon.

name: Vaporeon
Description: Vaporeon, the Bubble Jet Pokemon. Vaporeon love fresh, clean water and can make their bodies melt away into water as well.

name: Jolteon
Description: Its cells generate a low level of electricity. This power is amplified by the static electricity of its fur, enabling the Pokemon to drop thunderbolts. The bristling fur is made of electrically charged needles.

name: Flareon
Description: Flareon, the Flame Pokemon. Flareon is the evolved form of Eevee. The air it inhales is ignited by a flame inside its body and expelled as fire.

name: Porygon
Description: A Pokemon that consists entirely of programming code. Capable of moving freely in cyberspace.

name: Omanyte
Description: Omanyte, the Spiral Pokemon. Believed to have lived over two billion years ago, recent research indicates that it was able to control its buoyancy by storing and releasing air in its shell.

name: Omastar
Description: Omastar, the evolved form of Omanyte. This extinct Pokemon is believed to have used its sharp fang to break through the shells of its prey in order to feed.

name: Kabuto
Description: Kabuto, the Ancient Pokemon. Though this Pokemon is now believed to be extinct, it had a hard shell that protected its body and is believed to have been a powerful swimmer.

name: Kabutops
Description: Omanyte and Omastar, Kabuto and Kabutops. It is believed these Pokemon became extinct tens of thousands of years ago. The detail of their behavior is shrouded in mystery. None of these Pokemon have ever been seen alive.

name: Aerodactyl
Description: Aerodactyl, the Fossil Pokemon. An ancient Flying type, it is equipped with sharp saw-like teeth.

name: Snorlax
Description: Snorlax's hunger isn't satisfied until it consumes 900 pounds of food. Then it goes back to sleep.

name: Articuno
Description: Articuno, the Freeze Pokemon. Articuno lives deep within mountain ranges, and is said to be able to fly by gracefully waving its tail.

name: Zapdos
Description: Zapdos, the Electric Pokemon. Zapdos has both Electric and Flying elements, and the flappage of its wings can create lightning.

name: Moltres
Description: Moltres, a Legendary Pokemon. Its virtues symbolize the Pokemon League competitions.

name: Dratini
Description: Dratini, the Dragon Pokemon. Dratini sheds its skin as it grows, often doing so while hidden behind large powerful waterfalls.

name: Dragonair
Description: Dragonair, the Dragon Pokemon. Dragonair has the ability to manipulate the elements as it wishes.

name: Dragonite
Description: Dragonite, the Dragon Pokemon. This extremely rare and highly intelligent type is able to fly faster than any known Pokemon.

name: MewTwo
Description: A Pokemon that was created by genetic manipulation. However, even though the scientific power of humans made its body, they failed to give it a warm heart.

name: Mew
Description: Mew is said to possess the genetic composition of all Pokemon. It is capable of making itself invisible at will, so it entirely avoids notice even if it approaches people.
